newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Standard Chartered sets HK$2 bln FRCD.
newsitem.headline: Standard Chartered sets HK$2 bln FRCD.

text.p: The following issue was announced by arranger Standard Chartered Bank on Wednesday.
BORROWER STANDARD CHARTERED BANK
AMOUNT HK$2 BLN COUPON 1MH+20 BP MATURITY 3 YRS
TYPE FRCD ISS PRICE PAR LAUNCH 04.JUN.97
PUTS NONE CALLS NONE REPLIES 18.JUN.97
LISTING NONE REPAYMENT BULLET DENOMS HK$1 MLN
RATING * SALE LMTS STANDARD TAX PROV
HOME CTRY HK GOV LAW ENGLISH PAY DATE 27.JUN.97
MGT LEVELS AND FEES
CO-LEAD MANAGERS HK$100 MLN+ 15 BP ALL-IN 25 BP
CO-MANAGERS HK$50-90 MLN 12 BP ALL-IN 24 BP
ARRANGER STANDARD CHARTERED BANK
CO-ARRGRS AND MARKET-MAKERS BNP HONG KONG, HSBC MARKETS AND
LTCB ASIA
NOTES *THE ISSUER IS RATED A2 BY MOODY'S AND SINGLE-A BY
STANDARD AND POOR'S AND AN ISSUE SPECIFIC RATING IS
BEING SOUGHT
**AS AN OECD ISSUER, THE FRCD ISSUE WOULD HAVE A
BIS RISK ASSET WEIGHTING OF 20 PERCENT.
***AN APPLICATION IS BEING MADE TO THE HONG KONG MONETARY
AUTHORITY FOR LAF (LIQUIDITY ADJUSTMENT FACILITY)
ELIBILITY
****THE ISSUE WILL BE ISSUED OFF HK$10 BILLION CD PROGRAM.
-- Hong Kong Newsroom (852) 2847 4039 http://www.hk97.com
